content.question:
Source: United States Census Bureau

Which of the following patterns is indicated by the population pyramid shown?

choices.label: Levels of education and contraceptive usage are high among women.
Government policies encourage women to have multiple children.
The population has a high total fertility rate.
Government policies discourage women from having multiple children.
The population has a low infant mortality rate.

content.answer: The population has a high total fertility rate.

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Describe spatial patterns presented in maps and in quantitative and geospatial data.
